key_drivers: VIX rising to 20.46 (+7.18%) signals risk-off shift, boosting safe-haven assets GC (+1 risk mood), SI, and 6J; CL STRONG_BULLISH on 9.0mb inventory draw and US-Iran geopolitical tensions
BoJ hawkish trajectory (0.75%, spring hike expected) combined with risk-off VIX pushes 6J to STRONG_BULLISH (+5); BoJ divergence from Fed is the dominant FX theme
MOVE index falling sharply (-6.27% week) and SOX rising (+4.44% month) support NQ BULLISH (+4) despite VIX rising intraday
